subject: PHP error detected on site lplannarehab
preview: Hi WP Perk,   Our server monitoring detected that your site lplannarehab is displaying a PHP error. An inspection of the server logs indicated the following:   =================================  2019/

full_threads.body:
Hi WP Perk,

Our server monitoring detected that your site lplannarehab is displaying a PHP error. An inspection of the server logs indicated the following:

=================================
2019/09/30 03:10:39 [error] 35707#35707: *9833 FastCGI sent in stderr: "PHP message: PHP Warning: file_exists(): open_basedir restriction in effect. File(/www/lannarehab_792/public/wp-content/plugins/wp-rocket/inc/classes/Buffer/class-cache.php) is not within the allowed path(s): (/www/lplannarehab_864/public:/www/lplannarehab_864/mysqleditor:/www/lplannarehab_864/web:/www/lplannarehab_864/deploy:/www/lplannarehab_864/deployment:/www/lplannarehab_864/deployments:/usr/share:/tmp) in /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-content/advanced-cache.php on line 32PHP message: PHP Deprecated: Function create_function() is deprecated in /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-content/plugins/revslider/includes/framework/functions-wordpress.class.php on line 257PHP message: PHP Fatal error: Uncaught Error: Class 'ComposerAutoloaderInitf22b8825991ccda35c7813f5b3928f77' not found in /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-content/plugins/wordpress-seo/vendor/autoload.php:7
Stack trace:
#0 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-content/plugins/wordpress-seo/wp-seo-main.php(79): require()
#1 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-content/plugins/wordpress-seo/wp-seo.php(48): require_once('/www/lplannareh...')
#2 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-settings.php(362): include_once('/www/lplannareh...')
#3 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-config.php(94): require_once('/www/lplannareh...')
#4 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-load.php(37): require_once('/www/lplannareh...')
#5 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-blog-header.php(13): require_once('/www/lplannareh...')
#6 /www/lplannarehab_864/public/index.php(17): require('/www/lplannareh...')
#7 {main}
thrown in /www/lplannarehab_864/public/wp-content/plugins/wordpress-seo/vendor/autoload.php on line 7" while reading response header from upstream, client: 36.77.236.44, server: lp.lannarehab.com, request: "GET /?kinsta-monitor HTTP/1.0", upstream: "fastcgi://unix:/var/run/php7.3-fpm-lplannarehab.sock:", host: "lp.lannarehab.com", referrer: "https://my.kinsta.com/sentry"
=================================


If you are actively working on the site feel free to ignore this message. Otherwise if have any questions, please feel free to reach out to our support team by responding to this email or by opening a conversation within MyKinsta. We are available 24/7 to assist you!

Thank you!
The Kinsta Team
